00213 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00214 {
00215     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00216 
00217     if ( globalThresholdingTime_ != 0 )
00218         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_;
00219 
00220     if ( templateFilteringTime_ != 0 )
00221         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_;
00222 
00223     if ( averagingFilteringTime_ != 0 )
00224         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_;
00225 
00226     if ( thinningTime_ != 0 )
00227         totalTime_ += *thinningTime_;
00228 
00229     if ( regionsExtractionTime_ != 0 )
00230         totalTime_ += *regionsExtractionTime_;
00231 
00232     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_ != 0 )
00233         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_;
00234 
00235     if ( spacesLocationFindingTime_ != 0 )
00236         totalTime_ += *spacesLocationFindingTime_;
00237 };
